Changelog

* 1.0.3 [2019-03-01]: Updated package management framework

* 1.0.2 [2019-02-19]: Documentation update

* 1.0.1 [2019-02-19]: Updated to newest dependency versions

* 1.0.0 [2018-02-18]: Initial release
